During Wednesday 's airing of her TBS show , " Full Frontal with Samantha Bee , " the namesake host called Ivanka a " feckless c**t " over what she apparently considered to be a tone - deaf social media post that featured a photo of Ivanka and her child cuddling . The photo was widely panned by celebrities , who suggested the photo was tone - deaf because Ivanka shared it amid reports that the federal Office of Refugee Resettlement reportedly lost track of about 1,500 immigrant children during the final three months of 2017 . In response to the photo , Bee said , “ You know , Ivanka , that ’s a beautiful photo …
